data.title: GAC AION Partners with BOI to Source Thai Suppliers at “AION Sourcing Day”
data.description: GAC AION, a major Chinese electric vehicle manufacturer, partnered with Thailand

data.title: Celebrity lawyer will not seek bail on fraud, money-laundering case
data.description: High-profile lawyer Sittra Biabungkerd, who was arrested along with his wife Patthitta Biabungkerd on fraud and money-laundering charges, has decided not to apply for bail for himself but intends to seek temporary release for her, their lawyer said on Friday.

data.title: Lawyer Sittha, wife face intense questioning as investigation deepens
data.description: Police have frozen the duo’s accounts and plan to oppose bail when they seek court permission to detain them pending further probe into the embezzlement case

data.title: Government steps up attempts to crack down on mule accounts
data.description: In an attempt to step up the crackdown on scammers, a memorandum of understanding was signed recently by the Department of Business Development and the Central Investigation Bureau to prevent and suppress corporate mule accounts and the use of Thais as nominees.

data.title: Thai FDA ramps up inspection of imported grapes over toxin concerns
data.description: Authorities hold nearly 7 tonnes of imported Shine Muscat grapes following the detection of 50 toxic residues in samples last month

data.title: 324 recipes being considered for listing as National Essential Medicines
data.description: Some 324 Thai traditional medicines recipes for treating 16 symptoms are being promoted to be listed as National Essential Medicines.

data.title: "Thainakarin Hospital Welcomes Russian Delegation"
data.description: Thainakarin Hospital, under the leadership of Clinical Prof. Dr. Tipchart Punyaratabandhu, Hospital Director and Medical Director, and Dr. Watson Aphiwattanakoon, Administrative Director, recently hosted a distinguished group of public health officials, international economic affairs executives, physicians, and hospital directors from Russia. The visit was focused on exploring potential partnerships to refer patients seeking advanced cancer care and other treatments.

data.title: Violent attacks in Amsterdam football match tied to antisemitism
data.description: AMSTERDAM — The Israeli government said it was sending two planes to the Netherlands on Friday to rescue citizens injured in Amsterdam after bursts of violence tied to a football game between a Dutch and an Israeli team, which Israeli and Dutch officials described as antisemitic attacks.

data.title: IRPC Drives Innovation for Sustainable Growth
data.description: IRPC forecasts a surge in oil demand during the winter season. The forecast aligns with the petrochemical group

data.title: Bitkub Exchange and Bitkub Academy announce collaboration with Puffer to collaboratively introduce Liquid Restaking Protocol to Thailand
data.description: Bangkok, Thailand – November 7, 2024 – Bitkub Online Co., Ltd., the operator of Bitkub Exchange, a leading digital asset exchange in Thailand, and Bitkub Labs Co., Ltd., the operator of Bitkub Academy, a learning center for blockchain technology and digital assets, today announced a collaboration with Puffer, a leading project on EigenLayer, to extendly introduce Liquid Restaking Protocol to the Thai users community.

data.title: Kelantan state to seek okay from KL to build border wall along Thai border
data.description: Kelantan state opposite Narathiwat province will propose the government to build a 100-kilometre-long wall in a new move to crack down on cross-border crimes and smuggling.

data.title: Thailand cuts palm oil content in biodiesel to curb rising costs
data.description: The Energy Ministry will cut palm oil content from 7% to 5% in biodiesel in response to rising palm oil prices; minister assures car engines will not be affected

data.title: Celebrate Gundam’s 45th Anniversary at Siam Paragon Exhibition
data.description: The wait is finally over for Gunpla fans! Dream Toy Co., Ltd., the official importer and distributor of Bandai toys and collectibles from Japan, in collaboration with Siam Paragon and Siam Center, is set to offer an unparalleled experience with "BANDAI SPIRIT HOBBY EXHIBITIONS 2024". The event marks the 45th anniversary of Gundam, the popular Japanese anime series, featuring a much-anticipated Gundam showcase and activities. Under the theme "Fun to Build", the exhibition will take place across two venues, from today until 17 November 2024 at Parc Paragon, Siam Paragon, with the "GUNPLA Builders World Cup in Thailand (GBWC) 2024" also featured at Siam Center’s Atrium 1 from 13-17 November 2024.

data.title: Defence minister to visit Koh Kut to assert sovereignty
data.description: Defence Minister Phumtham Wechayachai will visit Koh Kut in Trat on Saturday to reassert Thailand

data.title: Three charged in One Direction singer Liam Payne's death
data.description: BUENOS AIRES: Three people have been charged in relation to One Direction singer Liam Payne

data.title: Trump presidency may end resettlement of Myanmar refugees
data.description: President-elect’s campaign announcements worry human rights advocates who warn of stricter US regulations on trade and migrants

data.title: Malaysia's ex-PM ordered to pay $300,000 over defamatory remarks
data.description: KUALA LUMPUR - A Malaysian court has ordered opposition leader and former Prime Minister Muhyiddin Yassin to pay more than US$300,000 to another politician in a defamation case, state media said on Friday, adding to the former premier

data.title: CPF Swine Business Triumphs with ‘Waste No More, Sustaining Sustainability’
data.description: Initiative showcases company's commitment to responsible resource management across its pig farming operations in Thailand

data.title: Thailand Pavilion in global spotlight at China Import Expo
data.description: Commerce Minister Pichai Naripthaphan has unveiled the Thailand Pavilion at the China International Import Expo (CIIE) 2024 in Shanghai, aiming to draw a global audience and encourage them to become "regular customers of Thai products".

data.title: First Thai veteran in Korean War to be buried in S. Korea
data.description: When the remains of Command Sergeant Major Rod Asanapan are laid to rest at a memorial cemetery in South Korea next week, he will be the first Thai veteran of the Korean War to rest in peace in the land where he served for one year.

data.title: China and Thailand to work on promoting tourism in China and ASEAN
data.description: The China Tourism Academy is working on a plan to promote tourism development in China and ASEAN, using Thailand as a tourism hub, the Association of Thai Travel Agents, told Thansettakij on Thursday.

data.title: Paetongtarn ‘committed’ to building stronger Mekong region
data.description: Thai PM proposes connectivity, competitiveness and community as priorities for a more prosperous Greater Mekong Subregion

data.title: US to hand back ancient Thai treasures from Ban Chiang next week
data.description: Repatriation of 3,000-year-old items smuggled from UNESCO Heritage site will be accompanied by seminar marking International Day Against Trafficking in Cultural Property

data.title: Marcos signs laws on Philippine sea rights as China row persists
data.description: MANILA — Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr enacted on Friday two laws bolstering his nation

data.title: Beyond documentary: Recording the world’s truths
data.description: The “Record” category of the 16th World Film Festival of Bangkok allows audiences to experience cinema as a tool for recording the world’s truths, which has evolved far beyond traditional documentary filmmaking.

data.title: Thailand halved multidimensional poverty in 7 years, but gaps in welfare remain
data.description: A staggering 455 million of the world’s poor live in countries exposed to violent conflict, hindering and even reversing hard-won progress to reduce poverty, according to the latest update of the global Multidimensional Poverty Index (MPI) report.
